Name: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome 1
Definition: A Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the HPS1 gene on chromosome 10q24.

Name: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome 2
Definition: A Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the gene encoding the beta-3A subunit of the AP3 complex (AP3B1) on chromosome 5q14.1.

Name: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome 3
Definition: A Hermasky-Pudlak syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the HPS3 gene on chromosome 3q24.

Name: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome 4
Definition: A Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the HPS4 gene on chromosome 22q12.1.

Name: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome 5
Definition: A Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the HPS5 gene on chromosome 11p14.

Name: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome 6
Definition: A Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the HPS6 gene on chromosome 10q24.

Name: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome 7
Definition: A Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the DTNBP1 gene on chromosome 6p22.3.

Name: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome 8
Definition: A Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the BLOC1S3 gene on chromosome 19q13.

Name: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome 9
Definition: A Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the gene encoding palladin (BLOC1S6) on chromosome 15q21.
